November 2012
Portland, Oregon. November 12-13, 2012.
<h3> Outline

I was invited to present at a conference promising to bring together in a dynamic and collaborative environment the leaders in social impact, business, and venture capital investment innovation. [http://socialventuresociety.org/unconference/ website] [http://us6.campaign-archive2.com/?u=adeb969bbfd2716b2416778ac&id=93902578be details]

I set out to explain my experience as a change agent, a term popular in the field of [[Change Management]]. I started with three points: Explain my influence over large problems. Translate that into something the audience can use. Preview how I'm making big problem solving easier.
I wrote three pages of notes. Some of these became pages in their own right. As with most things I write, this story is not complete.
I set out to explain my experience as a change agent, a term popular in the field of [[Change Management]].
I started with a plan to set my current work on federated wiki into the context of my own experience.
Explain my influence over large problems.
Translate that into something the audience can use.
Preview how I'm making big problem solving easier.
I wrote three pages of notes following my plan. Some of these became pages in their own right. As with most things I write, this story is not complete.
I set out to explain my experience as a change agent, a term popular in [[Classic Change Theories]].
